snippet: The players union will vote on a move similar to decertification, and the league filed a complaint in federal court seeking to confirm the lockout’s legality.
abstract: NHL and players union trade legal jabs, raising likelihood that the entire 2012-2013 NHL season will be cancelled.
lead_paragraph: The players union will vote on a move similar to decertification, and the league filed a complaint in federal court seeking to confirm the lockout’s legality.

headline.seo: N.H.L. and Union Trade Legal Barbs, Raising Odds of Canceled Season
headline.main: New Moves Raise Risk of Losing Full N.H.L. Season
headline.print_headline: New Moves Push N.H.L. Toward Edge
